title: Banshees Vail glitch?
body: Played a game earlier as malz and had the weirdest bug/glitch, where the enemy teams banshees vail didn't want to dissapear. I would W>E>Q>R and the vail would stay up the whole time. If i was lucky it would go down but it was back up in 5 secs. Anyone else get this glitch?

replies.body: >**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
